name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Fullstack Python Angular Developer
professional_summary: Developed responsive web applications using Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, resulting in a 25% increase in user engagement.
Designed and implemented robust back-end services using Python, Flask, SQLAlchemy, and Swagger/OpenAPI.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver new features into production, improving team efficiency by around 30%.
Wrote clean, efficient, and well-documented code following best practices, reducing code review time by about 2 weeks.
Troubleshooted, debugged, and enhanced application performance, resulting in a 40% increase in user satisfaction.
Contributed to CI/CD pipeline improvements and automation, streamlining deployment processes.
Improved code quality by implementing code reviews, static analysis, and testing.
Successfully managed and prioritized multiple projects simultaneously, meeting all deadlines.
Developed and maintained technical documentation, ensuring accurate and up-to-date information.
Collaborated with stakeholders to define project requirements, ensuring alignment with business goals.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using Swagger/OpenAPI, improving API documentation by 50%.
Utilized Agile/Scrum practices to manage and track project progress, enhancing team collaboration.
Worked with Git, CI/CD pipelines, and Agile/Scrum practices to deliver production-grade software solutions.
Utilized cloud platforms, such as AWS, Azure, and GCP, to deploy and manage applications.
Improved team collaboration and communication by organizing regular team meetings and workshops.
Enhanced code maintainability by implementing modular and reusable code.
Developed and maintained Docker containers, improving application portability.
Improved application performance by optimizing database queries and implementing caching.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features, improving team efficiency by around 25%.
